ComicInfo.Summary: Last year's groundbreaking Infestation series, IDW's first-ever event, saw many teams from multiple universes fight off a zombie invasion. Now, an even bigger threat has risen to threaten the growing IDW multiverse: Lovecraftian demons threaten to reach across time and space and destroy everyone everywhere and everywhen! Also featuring Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, this framing issue presents a threat that perhaps not even TRANSFORMERS, G.I. JOEs, Danger Girl, and others can surmount!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 16:20:48. [CVDB312803]
ComicInfo.Inker: David Messina, Federica Manfredi, Gaetano Carlucci
ComicInfo.Characters: Amanda Houellebecq, Bools, Britt, Cross, Donatello, H.P. Lovecraft, Ironhide, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Optimus Prime, Raphael, Snake Eyes
ComicInfo.Teams: Autobots, Elder Gods, G.I. Joe, Great Old Ones, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Vampires, Zombies
